name: Gleaming Cleave
effects: 3 physical attacks (0.8x each, 2.4x total, ATK) to one random enemy

name: Gleaming Cleave
光神連斧
광신의 연속 도끼
Tranchant lumineux
Leuchtendes Beil

desc_short: Attack three enemies chosen at random
隨機對全體敵人攻擊3次
Attaque trois ennemis choisis au hasard

desc_long: Randomly selects targets from all enemies and deals damage three times.
以全體敵人為對象隨機選擇目標，連續進行3次攻擊。
적 전체에서 무작위로 대상을 골라 3회 피해를 줍니다.
Attaque trois ennemis choisis au hasard.
Verursacht dreimal Schaden bei zufällig ausgewählten Gegnern.
Ataca a tres enemigos al azar
